channel.title: Quanta on Pierre Aronnax
channel.description: Recent content in Quanta on Pierre Aronnax

item.title: What is Quanta?
item.description: Quanta is a proof-of-concept (POC) application that utilizes the Nautilus framework for secure, decentralized communication and file transfer.

item.title: Why It Matters?
item.description: Quanta demonstrates how Nautilus enables developers to build secure, decentralized applications with post-quantum cryptographic security.
